If it does, please refer to it , If they are not similar, ignore it. cloud you help to translate[zh]:你的老師在哪裡呢？

Please help me determine whether it has the same meaning as the next [zh] (the one I identified as the closest). If it does, please refer to it , If they are not similar, ignore it. cloud you help to translate[zh]:我有兩個哥哥和一個妹妹。
Tatusa ku kaka nu maku tu vava’inayan , cacay ku sava tu vavahiyan .
